amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds for the Missouri River Ecostystem Restoration Plan (MRERP).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to continue the study conducted by the Army Corps of Engineers pursuant to section 5018(a)(1) of the Water Resources Development Act of 2007.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Luetkemeyer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
